评论概述: Great pair of business casual pants
评论详情: I absolutely love these pants, and I don't say that about many things. They have just the right amount of flex in the waist to provide all-day comfort, the tapered leg provides a nice, clean look, and the material is soft to the touch. I might order one size smaller in the waist, but that's more about me being in between sizes and not because the pants run large. I have three pairs now, so I legit like them, and it's not just a glowing review for the heck of it.

I love these pants! The flex waist makes them extremely stretchy and comfortable. Wrinkles seem to fall out easily, as well. I bought one pair initially and then two additional in different colors I liked them so much.

These fit very well and have a good amount of stretch in all the right spots.  After trying on my first pair I bought 3 more immediately.  The fabric is very comfortable, very soft.  Legs were a tad long but that's no big deal.The stretch of the pant line is exceptional. It's tight enough to stay in place with full pockets yet stretchy enough to reach my arm in to adjust my bird.Someone commented about dog hair being an issue but I didn't notice this. My dogs don't shed much but I see it on my dark shirts often.

OK, so I tend to fluctuate between 220lbs and 205, and it's that "waist" fit that can become uncomfortable.  These pants have just the right "stretch" to be comfortable wherever I am in my battle with the buldge.

评论概述: Nice brushed feel and perfect fit
评论详情: By far the best daily work pants I have ever worn. I have multiple pairs now.

The overall construction, with the exception of the pockets, is very good to excellent.  The fabric seems to be tough and durable but is not breathable.  Definetly not summer pants.  The big issue for me is the front pockets are not deep enough.  When sitting in an arm chair with deep cushions, my cell phone tends to slop out of my pocket.  At home, this is okay, I just look in the last cushioned chair I sat in, but for being out and about, I have had to purchase a cell phone holster that clips to my belt to make sure my cell phone stays with me.
